name: GPT-4o
usage: OpenAI's most advanced and versatile model, balancing intelligence, speed, and cost. Excellent for complex reasoning, content generation, vision capabilities, and chat.

name: GPT-4 Turbo
usage: High-performance model optimized for complex tasks, offering a large context window and strong reasoning capabilities. Ideal for in-depth analysis and generation.

name: GPT-3.5 Turbo
usage: Fast and cost-effective model, suitable for a wide range of less complex tasks, including summarization, translation, and chatbots.

name: Gemini 1.5 Pro
usage: Google's highly capable multimodal model with a breakthrough long context window. Excellent for understanding and reasoning across large documents, codebases, audio and video.

name: Gemini 1.5 Flash
usage: Google's fastest and most cost-efficient Gemini model, optimized for high-volume, low-latency tasks. Good for summarization, chat, and captioning.

name: Claude 3 Opus
usage: Anthropic's most powerful model, offering top-tier performance on highly complex tasks, strong reasoning, vision capabilities, and a large context window. Ideal for R&D, strategy, and complex analysis.

name: Claude 3 Sonnet
usage: Balanced model from Anthropic, offering strong performance at a lower cost than Opus. Suitable for enterprise workloads, data processing, and quality-sensitive generation.

name: Claude 3 Haiku
usage: Anthropic's fastest and most compact model, designed for near-instant responsiveness. Excellent for customer interactions, content moderation, and cost-saving tasks.

name: Mistral Large
usage: Mistral AI's flagship model, offering top-tier reasoning capabilities and fluency in multiple languages. Strong for complex instruction following and generation.

name: Mixtral 8x7B
usage: A high-quality sparse mixture-of-experts model by Mistral AI, known for its strong performance, efficiency, and multilingual capabilities. Excellent balance of cost and performance.

name: Mistral Small
usage: A cost-effective and fast model by Mistral AI (mistral-small-2402), suitable for simpler tasks, summarization, and applications requiring quick responses.
